title: Butter and Herb Mashed Potatoes (Puré con mantequilla y especias) - Idahoan Mashed Potatoes - Idahoan Foods LLC
description: El Butter and Herb Mashed Potatoes de Idahoan es un clásico en las mesas familiares, hechas con papas 100% naturales de Idaho® está perfectamente mezclado con mantequilla y especias.
sitename: Idahoan Mashed Potatoes - Idahoan Foods LLC
cleaned_text: El Butter and Herb Mashed Potatoes de Idahoan es un clásico en las mesas familiares, hechas con papas 100% naturales de Idaho® está perfectamente mezclado con mantequilla y especias. Recetas Sugerencias de proteínas Detalles del producto Instrucciones para preparación Stove Top Preparation - Add 2 cups of water to a medium sized sauce pan and heat water on high to a boil. - Remove boiling water from heat and potatoes. a fork to moisten all potatoes and let stand 1 minute. - Stir and serve. Microwave Preparation All microwaves vary may have to be adjusted. - Measure 2 cups of water into a microwave safe bowl. - Microwave on high for 4-5 minutes to heat water to a boil. CAUTION: Bowl and water will be very hot! - Remove water from microwave and immediately add entire pouch of potatoes all at once, using a fork to moisten all potatoes and let stand 1 minute. - Stir well and MIXED TOCOPHEROLS. CONTAINS: MILK. GLUTEN FREE
